Articles.Content:
Hai, this is my first KSP Forum post, pls dont shoot if i have posted in the wrong place or whatnot.

Anywho..

I have been searching high and low for mods which improve how the launchpad looks/works prior to and during launch.

So far I have tried an array of different exhaust particle effects but none have given any realistic launch effect.

I'd love to find a mod which has effects for venting flame and smoke from the pad...

Also; I downloaded CoolRockets for the pre-launch cryogenic effects but it doesn't seem to work with 0.25....

Is there a config trick to getting old mods to work? (i cant imagine that 0.25 would have broken much).

Love from

Gav.

<3
Whooooaaaaaaa..... I am not going to shoot you... You may try "real launch sites" mod...
